name: ProjectL
body:
The Game of Life, also known simply as Life, is a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970. 

***
# work on the project:
## Danil Mazurov (Fene4ka) - Development of a software project code.
## Sabitov Evgeniy (each24) - Development of third-party libraries, software development project interface code.
## Batenyov Alexey (LeshaTheSlayer) - Test coverage functions.
## Ili Daniil (TufTeddy) - Adaptation of a UNIX-system, development of the graphical interface of the project for UNIX-Systems.
## Em Alexander (SamAlexunder) - Project owner. Adapting the code under UNIX-systems (implementation of adaptation for mobile systems during the second version of the project), development of the graphical interface of the project for UNIX-Systems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
